name: Dale Bell
tagline: Writer, Editor in Chief, Benevolent Tyrant, and The Ultimate IB Learner
description: Dale Bell is a determined journalist with only one goal, which he pursues tirelessly: getting the website trending. And also the truth or whatever.

name: Auguste Rame
description: Master of the unnecessary 6-month-long website redesign, chronic procrastinator.

name: Caleb Levy
description: When he’s not tearing up improving articles for The Snitch, he’s putting off improving articles for The Snitch.

name: Bill Angell
description: Was once told that “Theatre isn’t all there is to life.” In a dejected trance he found himself waking up in The Snitch’s office, and decided to stay out of gratitude for the staff not eating him.

name: Sebastián Valderrama

description: Iä! Iä! Cthulhu fhtagn! Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn!

name: Liv Dentoni
description: We are decidedly not all in this together.

name: Natalie Weng
description: Can both doodle pictures and hold common household items. You decide.

name: Bruno Chong
description: This bio has been redacted by The Administration for clarity.

name: Nicholas Daum
description: What they don’t know is that I’m using a vast sweatshop of monkeys to write all my articles. One day they’ll finish one.

name: Evan Song
description: So bad at my job I got fired from the Snitch editing team. That's right, the SNITCH EDITING TEAM. You can't fall much lower than that.

name: Dr. Verman Politiczuck
tagline: Political and Historical Contributor, Eaten By Sharks
description: I had a PhD in political-historical studies from Diploma-Mills Online University. Also, Dale hated my name for some reason so he instructed to have sharks eat me. Unfortunate.
